Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 9.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
64.
932Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā…  napurejātapaccayā…  napacchājātapaccayā…  naāsevanapaccayā…  nakammapaccayā…  navipākapaccayā… —  nevadassanena nabhāvanāya…pe…  najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇaṃ…pe…  namaggapaccayā—  ahetukaṃ…pe…  nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo…pe…  navippayuttapaccayā…  tīṇi.
<< Nahetuup9.5.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
